header: 英语语法初阶练习题（一）

questions.question: I want ______ goodbye to your parents.
questions.explanation: 根据句子中的语法，动词“want”后面的动词应该是现在时态的单数形式，因此应该是“to say

questions.question: I ______ that book on my desk yesterday.
questions.cn: 昨天我把那本书放在我的桌子上了。

questions.question: I have a lot of ______ to do today.
questions.cn: 今天我有很多作业要做。

questions.question: We have to stay at home ______.
questions.cn: 圣诞节我们只好待在家里。

questions.question: We have a big party ______ New Year's Day.
questions.cn: 我们新年有个盛大聚会。

questions.question: ______ have to go to school today?
All we do is ______ hard.
questions.cn: 我们所做的事情就是努力学习。

questions.question: Riding bicycles on the busy street ______ dangerous.
questions.cn: 在繁忙的街道上骑脚踏车是危险的。

questions.question: To look at those children ______ me happy.
questions.cn: 看着那些孩子使我高兴。

questions.question: I ______ to see my mother the next day.
questions.cn: 第二天我去看望了我的母亲。

questions.question: He is seldom late for school, ______?
The teacher told us ______ the homework.
You have done nothing today, ______?
questions.cn: 你今天什么活都没做,是吗?

questions.question: Everyone must finish ______ homework today.
questions.cn: 今天每个人必须完成作业。

questions.question: ______ size of skirt do you wear?
His father hit him ______ the head.
I am used to ______ up early.
I don't feel like ______ at home.
He is proud of ______ a Chinese.
questions.cn: 他为自己是华人而自豪。

questions.question: Those students are playing ______.
questions.cn: 那些学生正在户外玩耍。

questions.question: We watched a football match ______.
questions.cn: 我们在电视上看了一场足球赛。

questions.question: The above ______ the most important facts.
questions.cn: 以上是一些最重要的事实。

questions.question: I prefer reading books ______ TV.
questions.cn: 我宁愿看书而不愿看电视。

questions.question: The doctor cured him ______ his disease.
Many of you have done ______ best.
questions.cn: 你们许多人都尽力而为了。

questions.question: I had my watch ______ yesterday.
questions.cn: 我昨天让人修好了我的手表。

questions.question: Peter ______ about the days of the week.
questions.cn: 彼得正在谈论一星期有那些天。

questions.question: He helped me ______ my English lesson.
After breakfast he went to the zoo ______.
questions.cn: 早餐后他搭公车去动物园。

questions.question: We often have a lot of ______ in spring.
questions.cn: 我们这里春天常常多雨。

questions.question: Maybe the happiest people live ______.
questions.cn: 也许最快乐的人住在乡下。

questions.question: It ______ a lot in Taipei, especially in May.
questions.cn: 台北下很多雨,尤其是在五月。

questions.question: She came here ______ the morning of December 10.
questions.cn: 她在十二月十日的早上来这里的。

questions.question: Many people came to Taiwan ______ this month.
questions.cn: 许多人在这个月期间来到台湾。

questions.question: The red car is ______ than the green one.
questions.cn: 这辆红车比那辆绿车大。

questions.question: If there ______ no air, people won't live any more.
questions.cn: 如果没有空气,人们将不再能生存。

questions.question: Sue was heard ______ a song yesterday.
I have a sister, ______ lives in New York.
questions.cn: 我有个妹妹,她住在纽约。

header: 英语语法初阶练习题（二）

questions.question: He was made ______ all the desks.
questions.cn: 有人要他修理所有的课桌。

questions.question: Father told me ______ too much.
questions.cn: 父亲叫我不要梦想太多。

questions.question: The same mistakes should not ______ again.
We spent a lot of time ______ clothes.
questions.cn: 我们花了很多时间买衣服。

questions.question: I enjoy making friends, and ______ Mary.
questions.cn: 我喜欢交朋友,玛丽也喜欢。

questions.question: If I ______ you, I would buy the car.
questions.cn: 如果我是你,我就买这部车。

questions.question: Can you tell me ______ to fix it?
questions.cn: 你可以告诉我怎样修理它吗?

questions.question: I've worked in the company ______.
questions.cn: 我已经在这个公司工作几个月了。

questions.question: These are my books, not ______.
questions.cn: 这些是我的书,不是他们的。

questions.question: I have no idea what ______.
options: A. is he going to eat

questions.question: Do you remember ______?
questions.cn: 你记得她什么时候要来吗?

questions.question: I would like Bill ______ right away.
He usually eats breakfast before he ______ to school.
questions.cn: 他通常在上学之前吃早饭。

questions.question: ______ over at four-fifteen every afternoon.
questions.cn: 每天下午四时十五分下课。

questions.question: I was sick, ______ I went to school.
questions.cn: 虽然我病了,但是我还是去上学了。

questions.question: Father gave me a present ______ my birthday.
questions.cn: 我生日那天父亲给我一件礼物。

questions.question: The teacher asked me ______ the question.
questions.cn: 老师要我回答这个问题。

questions.question: ______ do you visit your grandparents?
questions.cn: 你多长时间探视你的祖父母一次?

questions.question: You will have ______ at the party.
questions.cn: 你在晚会上会玩得很开心的。

questions.question: Every student ______ to study English.
questions.cn: 每个学生都需要学英文。

questions.question: I have ______ for three of us.
questions.cn: 我有足够我们三个人用的票。

questions.question: These ______ days made me bored.
questions.cn: 这些阴雨绵绵的日子让我心烦。

questions.question: I was born in the summer ______ 1969.
questions.cn: 我出生于一九六九年的夏天。

questions.question: It is morning, ______ the birds are singing.
questions.cn: 是清晨了,因为鸟儿在啼叫。

questions.question: ______ people have seen this film.
questions.cn: 大多数人看过这部电影。

questions.question: I ______.
questions.cn: 我给我的叔叔写了一封信。
options: A. wrote a letter my uncle
B. wrote my uncle a letter
D. wrote a letter to give my uncle

questions.question: Is this picture ______?
questions.cn: 这幅画是要减价卖的吗?

questions.question: ______ you mind my opening the window?

header: 英语语法初阶练习题（三）

questions.question: We should spend more time ______.
questions.cn: 我们应该花更多时间读书。

questions.question: He has never been to Japan, ______?
Cats can see clearly in the ______.
questions.cn: 猫能在黑暗中清楚地看见东西。

questions.question: This was the ______ day in his life.
questions.cn: 这是他一生中最重要的日子。

questions.question: I saw a ______ accident this morning.
questions.cn: 今天早晨我看到了一起交通事故。

questions.question: I'd like to see your ______.
questions.cn: 我想看看你们的十速脚踏车。

questions.question: This took place in ______.
questions.cn: 这事发生在二十世纪三十年代。

questions.question: You ______ come if you are busy.
questions.cn: 如果你很忙,就不必来了。

questions.question: Why ______ you always interrupt me?
questions.cn: 你为什么总是一定要打断我呢?

questions.question: That is ______ he put his books.
My family ______ a happy one.
questions.cn: 我的家是一个幸福的家庭。

questions.question: None of our party ______ sick then.
questions.cn: 我们这帮人当时没有生病的。

questions.question: The United States ______ a developed country.
We ______ for London tonight.
questions.cn: 我们今晚将出发去伦敦。

questions.question: The car can only take ______ people.
You may use my pen and I'll use ______.
questions.cn: 你可以用我的笔,我用他的。

questions.question: ______ good boy he is!
questions.cn: 他是一个多好的男孩啊!

questions.question: He got used to ______ in winter.
Time ______, I will make it better.
questions.cn: 如时间允许, 我会做得更好。

questions.question: My mother is cooking dishes in the ______.
questions.cn: 我母亲正在厨房里面做菜。

questions.question: Tom is ______ than Joe or John.
questions.cn: 汤姆比乔或约翰的年纪大。

questions.question: John is not as ______ as Miss Brown.
questions.cn: 约翰没有布朗小姐个子高。

questions.question: Mr. Martin ______ the stories.
questions.cn: 马丁先生编造了那些故事。

questions.question: Have you ever ______ at the beach?
questions.cn: 你曾经在海边游过泳吗?

questions.question: It is nice ______ you to help us.
questions.cn: 承蒙您的好意帮助我们。

questions.question: Bob walks as ______ as you do.
I ______ about that.
questions.cn: 我曾对那件事感到好奇。

questions.question: Tom is ______ to work.
questions.cn: 汤姆的年龄足可以工作了。

header: 英语语法初阶练习题（四）

questions.question: There are ______ months in a year.
The last season of the year is ______.
questions.cn: 一年中最后一个季节是冬季。

questions.question: Doctors and nurses work in ______.
questions.cn: 医生和护士在医院工作。

questions.question: There is two ______ dollars in the envelope.
They ______ new knowledge every day.
questions.cn: 他们每天获得新的知识。

questions.question: I'll give you ______ special.
questions.cn: 我将给你某样特别的东西。

questions.question: Not ______ likes singing.
questions.cn: 不是每个人都喜欢唱歌。

questions.question: I don't like ______ in Hong Kong.
I ______ Mary $300 last week.
questions.cn: 上星期我借给玛丽三百美元。

questions.question: The children are playing ______ the beach.
questions.cn: 孩子们正在海滩上玩耍。

questions.question: Your dream will ______ one day.
questions.cn: 总有一天你的梦想将会实现。

questions.question: The ______ speak very good English.
questions.cn: 这些德国人英语说得很好。

questions.question: They tried to ______.
questions.cn: 他们试着让他高兴起来。

questions.question: ______ is a long way from Taipei to there.
questions.cn: 从台北到那里有很远的路。

questions.question: She has ______ all her money.
questions.cn: 她已经花光了所有的钱。

questions.question: I met a friend of ______ last night.
questions.cn: 昨晚我遇到我的一个朋友。

questions.question: This silk cloth ______ soft.
questions.cn: 这块丝绸摸起来很柔软。

questions.question: Gentlemen usually ______ good manners.
questions.cn: 绅士们通常有优雅的举止。

questions.question: John has very ______ friends.
questions.cn: 约翰几乎没有什么朋友。

questions.question: I have finished my ______.
questions.cn: 我已经做完了我的家庭作业。

questions.question: I'll tell you ______ next week.
questions.cn: 我将在下周某时告诉你。

questions.question: ______ can you finish the work?
questions.cn: 这项工作你多久能完成?

header: 英语语法初阶练习题（五）

questions.question: ______ splendid design it is!
questions.cn: 这是一个多么宏伟的计画啊!

questions.question: Her work is quite good ______.
questions.cn: 她的工作基本上还是很不错的。

questions.question: I have an important matter to ______ with you.
questions.cn: 我有件要事想和你商量。

questions.question: Let's make the plan ______.
questions.cn: 咱们来一步步地订这个计画。

questions.question: I visit Mrs. Green ______.
questions.cn: 我偶尔去看一下格林太太。

questions.question: Our plans have ______.
questions.cn: 我们的计画已经失败了。

questions.question: The First World War ______ in 1914.
questions.cn: 第一次世界大战爆发于1914年。

questions.question: Sam ______ visit his professor next week.
questions.cn: 萨姆下周要去拜访他的教授。

questions.question: He worked hard ______ make more money.
questions.cn: 他努力工作好赚更多钱。

questions.question: I'm feeling ______ better today.
questions.cn: 今天我感到身体好多了。

questions.question: The fine day ______ our pleasure.
questions.cn: 好天气增加了我们不少乐趣。

questions.question: ______, it's not such a bad decision.
questions.cn: 总之,这个决定还不太坏。

questions.question: When I write, I always keep a dictionary ______.
questions.cn: 我写东西时,总是把字典放在手边。

questions.question: Paris is ______ its scenery.
questions.cn: 巴黎以其景色优美着称。

questions.question: Did you go to school ______ last week?
questions.cn: 上周你是骑脚踏车上学的吗?

questions.question: He is kind and generous ______.
questions.cn: 他天生是个仁慈和宽宏大量的人。

questions.question: Mr. Brown does everything ______.
questions.cn: 布朗先生事事按规则办理。

questions.question: We shall go to Japan ______ Hong Kong.
questions.cn: 我们将取道香港去日本。

questions.question: David ______ and didn't go to school.
options: A. caught sight of a cold
C. caught up with a cold

questions.question: We have sent him to ______ on their work there.
questions.cn: 我们已派他去那里检查他们的工作。

questions.question: He has ______ to help us.
questions.cn: 他已尽了他最大的力量来帮助我们。

questions.question: It is very important to help ______.
______, children are innocent.
questions.cn: 一般来说,孩子们是天真无邪的。

questions.question: Most people do not ______ on Sunday.
questions.cn: 大多数人星期天不上班。

questions.question: My family all ______ by bike.
questions.cn: 我们一家人都骑脚踏车上班。

header: 英语语法初阶练习题（六）

questions.question: The ship will be ready ______ launching next spring.
questions.cn: 这条船明年春天可以下水。

questions.question: Paste was ______ flour and water.
questions.cn: 浆糊过去是用面粉和水制成的。

questions.question: All his plans ______.
questions.cn: 他的所有计画都成了泡影。

questions.question: May I ______ your conversation?
questions.cn: 我可以和你们一起聊聊吗?

questions.question: They often ______ on Saturday evening.
questions.cn: 他们常常在星期六晚上去看电影。

questions.question: They are ______ the sports meet.
questions.cn: 他们正在为运动会做准备。

questions.question: Wine is ______ grapes.
questions.cn: 葡萄酒是用葡萄酿造的。

questions.question: Mary is busy ______ her work.
questions.cn: 玛丽正忙着做她的工作。

questions.question: Why ______ you late for school yesterday, Mary?
questions.cn: 玛丽,你昨天为什么上学迟到了?

questions.question: He asked Mary ______ the door for him.
He won't go to school tomorrow, but I ______.
questions.cn: 他明天不去上学,但我要去。

questions.question: He does not need ______ his homework.
He went to bed late but ______ early.
This car ______ him a lot of money.
questions.cn: 这部车子花费了他很多钱。

questions.question: Tom is ______ student in his class.
questions.cn: 汤姆是他班上最快乐的学生。

questions.question: Stores in a big city are ______.
questions.cn: 大城市的商店较大也较好。

questions.question: Mother wanted me ______ my room.
questions.cn: 妈妈要我打扫我的房间。

questions.question: The teacher told him ______ hard.
questions.cn: 老师告诉他要努力学习。

questions.question: Do we have to ______ those TV programs tonight?
questions.cn: 今晚我们必须看那些电视节目吗?

questions.question: They talked about ______ to the movies.
questions.cn: 他们讨论了有关去看电影的事。

questions.question: I think it is an ______ movie.
questions.cn: 我想那是一部有趣的电影。

questions.question: Correct eating habits ______ very important.
questions.cn: 正确的饮食习惯非常重要。

questions.question: The weather is getting ______ every day.
The boy who ______ to Mary is happy.
questions.cn: 正在和玛丽讲话的那个男孩是快乐的。

questions.question: This letter ______ by Alice this morning.
questions.cn: 这封信是爱丽丝今天早上打的。

questions.question: Why did you give up ______ English?
questions.cn: 你为什么放弃了学习英文?

questions.question: Tom ______ to the teacher yesterday.
questions.cn: 汤姆昨天向老师说谎了。

questions.question: She has a lot of homework ______.
questions.cn: 她有许多家庭作业要做。

questions.question: Joe is happy ______ his friends.
questions.cn: 乔很高兴帮助他的朋友。

questions.question: I don't know how ______ my work.
questions.cn: 我不知道怎样做我的工作。

questions.question: We're going ______ this weekend.
questions.cn: 这个周末我们打算去打猎。

questions.question: Mr. Wang decided ______ to America to study English.
questions.cn: 王先生决定去美国学习英文。

header: 英语语法初阶练习题（七）

questions.question: My brother got someone ______ his bicycle yesterday.
questions.cn: 昨天我的哥哥叫人给他修理脚踏车。

questions.question: It took him much time ______ the work.
questions.cn: 完成这项工作花费了他很多时间。

questions.question: Please keep the fire ______ all night.
Your bicycle needs ______, Tom.
questions.cn: 汤姆,你的脚踏车需要修理了。

questions.question: Don't waste your time ______ to her.
questions.cn: 不要浪费时间对她讲话。

questions.question: The bad boy is used to ______ lies.
questions.cn: 这个坏男孩习惯于说谎。

questions.question: How many ______ are there for the job?
questions.cn: 有多少人申请这份工作?

questions.question: It is a ______ game.
questions.cn: 这是一场决定性的比赛。

questions.question: Tom handed in his ______ yesterday.
questions.cn: 汤姆昨天递交了他的辞职书。

questions.question: Outdoor ______ are important for our health.
questions.cn: 户外的活动对我们的身体健康很重要。

questions.question: We should treat animals with ______.
questions.cn: 我们应当仁慈地对待动物。

questions.question: Our ______ is limited to a few friendly letters.
questions.cn: 我们之间的通信只限于少数几封礼节上的信函来往。

questions.question: The designer's latest ______ is a backless evening dress.
questions.cn: 设计师的最新设计是一件露背的晚礼服。

questions.question: Some plants are beautiful, but they are ______.
questions.cn: 有些植物很美,但却有毒。

questions.question: He lay there without any ______.
questions.cn: 他一动不动地躺在那里。

questions.question: Tom told us an ______ story yesterday.
questions.cn: 昨天汤姆给我们讲了一个好笑的故事。

questions.question: He is proud of his ______ in medicine.
questions.cn: 他为他在医学上的成就而自豪。

questions.question: Many important discoveries come from ______.
questions.cn: 许多重要的发现都源于假想。

questions.question: Music has great ______ for most people.
questions.cn: 对于大多数人来说音乐有着巨大的吸引力。

questions.question: I always practice ______ English everywhere.
questions.cn: 无论在哪里我总是练习说英文。

questions.question: This is nine times ______ than that.
Nothing shall lead me ______ it.
questions.cn: 什么都不会使我做此事的。

questions.question: You should eat less, drink less, and sleep ______.
questions.cn: 你应该少吃,少喝,多睡觉。

questions.question: Which do you like ______, A or B or C?
questions.cn: 在A和B和C中,你最喜欢那一个?

questions.question: I know him ______ you do.
questions.cn: 我了解他和你了解的一样多。

questions.question: It is nice to have many ______.
He doesn't like swimming, neither ______ I.
questions.cn: 他不喜欢游泳,我也不喜欢。

questions.question: It is not always easy to make a ______.
questions.cn: 作出一个决定并非总是容易的。

questions.question: Sound travels ______ through water than through air.
questions.cn: 声音在水里传播比在空气中快。

questions.question: The boy is very ______. I like him very much.
questions.cn: 这个男孩非常活泼,我十分喜欢他。

questions.question: Read the sentence ______ please.
questions.cn: 请更仔细地读一遍这个句子。

questions.question: Jack can't jump so ______ as his brother.
questions.cn: 杰克不如他哥哥跳得高。

questions.question: Peter's handwriting is not as ______ as Kate's.
questions.cn: 彼得的笔迹没有凯特的好看。

questions.question: Our reading room is as ______ as theirs.
questions.cn: 我们的阅览室和他们的一样明亮。

questions.question: I don't think it is so ______.
questions.cn: 我认为这不是十分精彩。

questions.question: She said she could sing as ______ as birds.
questions.cn: 她说她唱歌像鸟一样好听。

questions.question: I really must have my watch ______.
questions.cn: 我真得叫人修理我的手表了。

questions.question: I'll talk to him when he ______.
questions.cn: 等他来了我会跟他谈谈。

questions.question: Enough ______ on that subject.
questions.cn: 关于那个话题已经说得够多的了。

questions.question: I don't know the ______ of the mountain.
I don't know the ______ of the river.
questions.cn: 我不知道这条河的深度。

questions.question: He has many ______ in his life.
Today is our first day of ______.
It's not easy to make a ______.
questions.cn: 做出一项选择是不容易的。

header: 英语语法初阶练习题（八）

questions.question: I want to find the ______ answer.
It is ______ to play on the street.
Bob often does everything ______.
questions.cn: 鲍伯经常做任何事都轻而易举。

questions.question: I like going fishing, ______ in winter.
questions.cn: 我喜欢钓鱼, 尤其喜欢在冬天钓鱼。

questions.question: What does he ______ on his farm this year?
I shall be ______ to accept your invitation.
questions.cn: 我将很乐意接受你的邀请。

questions.question: Sports can make our bodies ______.
questions.cn: 运动能使我们的身体健康。

questions.question: We are going to have a test in American ______.
questions.cn: 我们将要有一个美国历史的测验。

questions.question: Do you know who ______ these tools?
questions.cn: 你知道是谁发明了这些工具?

questions.question: He got a small ______ from Sue yesterday.
questions.cn: 他昨天收到了苏的一个小包裹。

questions.question: Our company makes many different kinds of ______.
questions.cn: 我们公司生产多种不同的产品。

questions.question: He was a famous singer in his ______.
questions.cn: 他年轻时是一位着名的歌唱家。

questions.question: I am not so ______ as he.
Our house is older and ______ than theirs.
questions.cn: 同他们的相比, 我们的房子又旧又小。

questions.question: He drinks ______ tea than I do.
We don't have so ______ rain as you think.
questions.cn: 我们这里下雨没有你想像的多。

questions.question: Dr. Brown has three thousand books ______.
questions.cn: 布朗博士至少有三千本书。

questions.question: Please come as ______ as you can.
John wrote ______ than Tom.
questions.cn: 约翰写得比汤姆更仔细。

questions.question: Which is the ______ road to the station?
Our country is getting ______ and stronger.
questions.cn: 我们的国家正变得越来越强大。

questions.question: The workers ______ a railway.
questions.cn: 工人们正在铺设一条铁路。

questions.question: In case of ______, call the police.
questions.cn: 出现紧急情况时,打电话叫警察。

questions.question: His ______ cost him the championship.
questions.cn: 他的犹豫使他失去了冠军的宝座。

questions.question: None of the suggestions was ______.
questions.cn: 没有一条建议是可以接受的。

questions.question: The watch is in need of ______.
Her sister sings as ______ as she.
questions.cn: 她姊姊唱得和她一样动听。

questions.question: Mike is two years ______ than I.
______ bike has been lost.
questions.cn: 他的脚踏车已经遗失了。

questions.question: There are no words ______ the blackboard.
John won't do his homework, but I ______.
questions.cn: 约翰将不做家庭作业,但是我要做。

questions.question: They both ______ yesterday morning.
questions.cn: 他们两人昨天早上都感冒了。

header: 英语语法初阶练习题（九）

questions.question: She washed her clothes ______ cleaned her room.
questions.cn: 她洗衣服,又打扫她的房间。

questions.question: Mary told me not ______ that door.
questions.cn: 玛丽告诉我不要关那扇门。

questions.question: ______ is hard to learn the game.
It ______ me ten dollars to buy the pencil.
questions.cn: 我花费了十圆买这枝铅笔。

questions.question: I remember ______ father told me.
questions.cn: 我记得父亲所告诉我的话。

questions.question: The girl ______ I like is Mary.
They have written to each other ______ three years.
questions.cn: 他们已经互相通信三年了。

questions.question: I watched the game at home ______ TV.
questions.cn: 我在家从电视上观赏那场比赛。

questions.question: There will be a soccer game ______.
questions.cn: 下星期日将有一场足球赛。

questions.question: Don't forget to take an umbrella ______ you.
questions.cn: 别忘记随身带一把雨伞。

questions.question: It looked like ______ yesterday.
questions.cn: 看起来昨天好像下雨了。

questions.question: If I were you, I ______ study harder.
questions.cn: 假如我是你,我会更加努力学习。

questions.question: Some ______ were playing in a forest.
questions.cn: 一些老鼠正在森林里玩。

questions.question: Judy sang on a ______ TV program.
questions.cn: 茱蒂在电视上的儿童节目中演唱过。

questions.question: Tom would like ______ this activity.
questions.cn: 汤姆愿意参加这项活动。

questions.question: Why do you let her ______ there?
questions.cn: 你为什么让她在那里等着?

questions.question: Everyone said that the dinner ______ delicious.
questions.cn: 每个人都说这晚餐味道很美。

questions.question: The car hit the bicycle and she ______.
questions.cn: 汽车撞倒了脚踏车,她受伤了。

questions.question: It is not ______ late to fight pollution.
questions.cn: 现在防治污染还不太迟。

questions.question: Mr. Wang is used to ______ up early.
A dictionary is used ______ the meanings of words.
questions.cn: 辞典是用来解释字的意思的。

questions.question: We don't allow ______ in class.
questions.cn: 我们不允许上课时吸烟。

questions.question: I met her ______ last spring.
questions.cn: 我曾在去年春天见过她。

questions.question: I heard him ______ a new song.
questions.cn: 我听见他在唱一首新歌。

questions.question: That motorcycle ______ last week.
questions.cn: 那辆机车上星期卖掉了。

questions.question: The Wang family have lived there ______ five years.
questions.cn: 王家住在那儿已经五年了。

questions.question: For example, I had ______ last Friday.
Finally, I ______ to stay at home.
There are three pictures ______ the wall.
After breakfast, she went to school ______.
questions.cn: 早餐后她搭公车上学去了。

questions.question: She usually works eight hours ______.
questions.cn: 她通常一天工作八小时。

questions.question: Why don't we ______ tonight?
questions.cn: 我们今晚何不去看电影?

questions.question: Did you ask him ______?
questions.cn: 你有没有问过他,他的弟弟在哪里?

header: 英语语法初阶练习题（十）

questions.question: Does he ______ two Chinese classes this afternoon?
questions.cn: 他今天下午有两节国文课吗?

questions.question: He makes the students ______ English every day.
questions.cn: 他叫他的学生每天说英语。

questions.question: ______ glass is there on the table?
He didn't help Mary ______ the windows last week.
questions.cn: 他上星期没有帮玛丽擦窗子。

questions.question: She washed a skirt yesterday, and I did, ______.
questions.cn: 她昨天洗了一条裙子,我也是。

questions.question: John and Mary are Americans, not ______.
questions.cn: 约翰和玛丽是美国人,不是中国人。

questions.question: He went to America ______ last week.
questions.cn: 他在上星期的某个时候去美国了。

questions.question: John ______ eats dinner at a restaurant with Mary.
questions.cn: 约翰从未跟玛丽在餐厅吃过晚饭。

questions.question: Your lessons are ______ hard.
questions.cn: 你们的功课并不总是困难的。

questions.question: My father often eats dinner at home ______ Mondays.
questions.cn: 我父亲时常星期一在家吃晚饭。

questions.question: He ______ on his clothes and went out.
Did you catch any ______ last year?
The girl students kept ______ all morning.
questions.cn: 女学生们整个早上都在唱歌。

questions.question: Both my sisters ______ his classmates.
questions.cn: 我的两位妹妹都是他的同班同学。

questions.question: His family ______ moving to America together.
questions.cn: 他的家人将要一起搬家到美国了。

questions.question: He is too old to ______ anything.
questions.cn: 他太老了什么也听不到。

questions.question: He spends ______ money than his brother.
Help ______ to the fruit, Tom.
questions.cn: 汤姆,自己来拿水果吃吧。

questions.question: He can neither ______ nor write English.
questions.cn: 他既不会讲英文也不会写英文。

questions.question: I go to school ______ a bicycle every day.
His daughter can ______ good Chinese.
questions.cn: 他的女儿会说流利的汉语。

questions.question: I ______ after breakfast every morning.
questions.cn: 每天早晨吃过早饭我都读英语。

questions.question: He ______ very hard and always comes home very late.
questions.cn: 他工作很辛苦,总是很晚才回家。

questions.question: I ______ play volleyball after school.
questions.cn: 我通常在放学后打排球。

questions.question: Will you go to the party ______?
questions.cn: 今天晚上你会去参加宴会吗?

questions.question: He needs a lot of money, ______.
Why not ______ to see a doctor?
I learn a lot ______ this week.
questions.cn: 在这个星期期间,我学了许多。

questions.question: ______ the blackboard, and read the word.
These are ______ flowers.
questions.cn: 这些是五朵漂亮的红色的花。

questions.question: We sit down and ______ the book.
I play volleyball after school ______.
questions.cn: 我每天放学后都打排球。

header: 英语语法初阶练习题（十一）

questions.question: Some students go ______ in big forests.
questions.cn: 有些学生在大森林里露营。

questions.question: The windows in the classroom are ______.
There is ______ book on the desk.
I see Mary ______ there.
questions.cn: 我看到玛丽正在那边玩。

questions.question: I eat breakfast ______ six-thirty in the morning.
questions.cn: 我在早上六点半吃早餐。

questions.question: Is ______ working in his office?
questions.cn: 爸爸正在他的办公室里工作吗?

questions.question: There are two ______ boys in our class.
questions.cn: 我们班上有两个印第安男孩。

questions.question: My little brother starts ______ English.
questions.cn: 我的小弟弟开始学英语。

questions.question: You teach Chinese, and he ______, too.
What time ______ you get up every morning?
Saturday is ______ last day of the week.
questions.cn: 星期六是一周的最后一天。

questions.question: Winter is ______ season of the year.
questions.cn: 冬天是一年的第四个季节。

questions.question: My mother is cooking ______ in the kitchen.
questions.cn: 我母亲正在厨房里做午餐。

questions.question: I saw many monkeys ______ the zoo yesterday.
questions.cn: 昨天我在动物园里看到许多猴子。

questions.question: Your dog barked ______ me this morning.
questions.cn: 今天早晨你的狗对着我叫。

questions.question: Why ______ you go to school by car?
questions.cn: 为什么你不坐车去上学?

questions.question: There ______ a football game next week.
questions.cn: 下星期将有一场足球比赛。

questions.question: Mary can write ______ English words.
questions.cn: 玛丽会写一些英文单词。

questions.question: This is ______ first time to walk home.
questions.cn: 这是我第一次走路回家。

questions.question: We usually ______ snow in December.
questions.cn: 我们这里十二月通常会下雪。

questions.question: There was a lot of ______ this winter.
Do you like ______ Day or New Year's Day?
questions.cn: 你喜欢圣诞节还是元旦?

questions.question: There are ______ of apples in our garden.
questions.cn: 我们的果园里有好几千个苹果。

questions.question: There are two ______ students in our school.
questions.cn: 我们的学校有两百个学生。

questions.question: Mathematics ______ his weak subject.
questions.cn: 数学是他比较差的科目。

questions.question: The meeting started five minutes ______.
questions.cn: 会议是五分钟前开始的。

questions.question: We have a lot of ______ at school.
questions.cn: 我们在学校玩得十分开心。

questions.question: There is no ______ on the moon.
The accident happened ______.
questions.cn: 那起事故是十年前发生的。

questions.question: There ______ a motor show next week.
Our teacher doesn't often ______ to the movies.
______ a large collection of CDs?
questions.cn: 她收集了很多音乐光碟吗?

questions.question: ______ me to the Hilton Hotel, please.
______, it's good for a beginner.
questions.cn: 整体来看,初学者有此水准不错了。

questions.question: Just a moment, please. I will ______.
Look! Joe ______ a new English dictionary.
questions.cn: 看! 乔正在买一本新的英文字典。

questions.question: ______ a left at the third turn.
questions.cn: 在第三个拐角处向左拐。

header: 英语语法初阶练习题（十二）

questions.question: ______ a greenhorn, you are pretty good.
questions.cn: 对一个新手来说,你是相当不错了。

questions.question: Take good care of ______ while I am away.
questions.cn: 我不在的时候照顾好你自己。

questions.question: I'm afraid I can't ______ you.
questions.cn: 恐怕我不能同意你的观点。

questions.question: You can ______ take the exam again.
______ exercise is important for health.
questions.cn: 适当运动对于身体健康至为重要。

questions.question: What gift ______ your father buy for you?
questions.cn: 你父亲要给你买什么礼物?

questions.question: So we are agreed, ______?
questions.cn: 那我们就达成一致意见了,是不是?

questions.question: ______ not ask the teacher?
questions.cn: 为什么不问一下老师呢?

questions.question: Does it really look beautiful ______ me?
______ begin with the naughty monkey.
questions.cn: 我们先看顽皮的猴子吧。

questions.question: Forget it. ______ will be all right.
questions.cn: 忘了它,一切都会好起来的。

questions.question: This dance step is very easy ______.
I don't think the map is ______.
questions.cn: 我认为地图没多大用途。

questions.question: ______ beautiful the feathers look!
questions.cn: 这羽毛看起来多漂亮啊!

questions.question: I bet they have lost ______ direction.
questions.cn: 我敢打赌他们迷失方向了。

questions.question: I know ______ you won't believe me.
Mr. White is ______ the insurance business.
questions.cn: 怀特先生在保险业界工作。

questions.question: I'm afraid I am fully ______ today.
questions.cn: 恐怕今天我的时间已经排满了。

header: 英语语法初阶练习题（十三）

questions.question: I ______ it in Canada last summer.
questions.cn: 我去年夏天在加拿大时买的。

questions.question: I think I should ______ him a watch.
questions.cn: 我想我应该给他买一块手表。

questions.question: I'll think about it and I'll call you ______ Monday.
questions.cn: 我得想一想,我星期一打电话给你。

questions.question: I think that ______ be all right.
You can begin with ______ history.
questions.cn: 你可以从它的历史开始。

questions.question: She was so angry that she ______ control herself.
questions.cn: 她太生气了,不能控制自己。

questions.question: I don't care ______ for the tea ceremony.
Then we ______ change it to nine thirty.
questions.cn: 那么我们可以改在九点三十分。

questions.question: No wonder you ______ it as your major.
questions.cn: 难怪你选它作你的主修。

questions.question: There's ______ need to clean the windows every day.
Before ______ o'clock in the evening, I think.
questions.cn: 我想应该是在晚上八点以前。

questions.question: ______ the viewfinder close to your eye.
This hall has a wide ______ of jade articles.
questions.cn: 这个馆汇集了很多玉器。

questions.question: Thank you very much ______ to see me.
Is your younger sister ______ see you?
I compose ______ own theme tune.
questions.cn: 我自己谱写我的主题曲。

questions.question: I think your computer ______.
questions.cn: 我想你的电脑是当机了。

questions.question: I always ______ E-mail to her. It's very convenient.
questions.cn: 我经常发电子邮件给她。非常方便。

questions.question: You have no right ______ me like that!
questions.cn: 你没有权利那样质问我!

questions.question: Maybe your mailbox ______.
questions.cn: 也许你的信箱被删除了。

questions.question: They will help ______ our economy.
questions.cn: 它们将帮助发展我们的经济。

questions.question: I think it is ______ than that one.
questions.cn: 我认为它比那个问题还难。

questions.question: I don't think that would prove ______ difficult.
I think the ______ hall is an ideal place.
questions.cn: 我认为食堂是最好的地方。

questions.question: Maybe there is something important ______.
questions.cn: 可能有什么重要的事要讨论。

questions.question: ______ don't you buy the Palm's devices?
What's wrong with ______ I have done?
Mr. Chairman, I want ______ a suggestion.
questions.cn: 主席先生,我想提一个建议。

questions.question: You ______ download it from the Internet.
She invited ______ to her birthday party.
questions.cn: 她邀请我们每一个人去参加她的生日宴会。

questions.question: Maybe you ______ use your private key.
questions.cn: 也许你可以运用你的私密金钥。

questions.question: I want a room with windows ______.
questions.cn: 我要一间窗户朝南的房间。

questions.question: But she ______ me all wrong.
questions.cn: 可是她对我太不公平了。

questions.question: Two or three of them ______ familiar.
questions.cn: 他们之中有两三个人看起来面熟。

questions.question: You are saying so to make me ______ good.
questions.cn: 你这样说只是让我感觉好点儿。

questions.question: The stone fell on his foot ______ hurt him badly.
questions.cn: 那块石头落在他的脚上伤得他很重。

questions.question: Actually, fishing isn't ______ me.
questions.cn: 实际上钓鱼不合我的胃口。

header: 英语语法初阶练习题（十四）

questions.question: I ______ believe in this sort of thing.
I've nothing ______ about the event.
questions.cn: 我对这次事件没什么可说的。

questions.question: It's not ______ you imagine.
questions.cn: 这并不如你想像的那么没有希望。

questions.question: I am not ______ I look.
questions.cn: 我不像我外表上看起来那么大意。

questions.question: I want ______ a glass of beer.
I am afraid we can't go ______.
questions.cn: 恐怕我们不能去游泳了。

questions.question: ______ buy a new hard drive?
questions.cn: 为什么不买一个新硬碟?

questions.question: But I ______ prefer meat and fish.
It ______ eight thousand five hundred dollars.
I think you should ______ a diet.
I'll be ______ you in a minute.
You can leave a message ______ the BBS.
questions.cn: 你可以在电子布告栏上留言。

questions.question: It's at the stop ______ the cinema.
______ so sad! We'll meet again.
questions.cn: 不要这样悲伤!我们还会见面的。

questions.question: We have the ______ fashion.
questions.cn: 我们有最新设计的款式。

questions.question: ______ can you treat me like that?
What kind of apartment ______ you like?
I heard he likes the job ______.
questions.cn: 我听说他很喜欢这个工作。

questions.question: I know, I can tell fantasy ______ real life.
questions.cn: 我知道,我能区分开幻觉和真实生活。

questions.question: Next Christmas I believe you will ______.
questions.cn: 我相信你下次圣诞节会待得长一些。

questions.question: I think ______ a part-time job.
questions.cn: 我想我会找一个兼职工作。

questions.question: Why don't you turn it ______?
questions.cn: 你为什么不开大声一点呢?

questions.question: It's up to you ______ a decision.
I check my e-mail ______.
questions.cn: 我每隔一天检查一次电子邮件。

header: 英语语法初阶练习题（十五）

questions.question: ______ a healthy body is more important.
I think it is a ______ movie.
questions.cn: 我认为它是一部动人的影片。

questions.question: Drivers can't be ______ careful.
questions.cn: 司机再怎么小心都不为过。

questions.question: Why do you dislike him ______?
questions.cn: 为什么你那么不喜欢他?

questions.question: How ______ you say that to me!
I think I'll enjoy ______ there.
questions.cn: 我想,我在那儿会玩得很高兴。

questions.question: ______ send her an e-card?
questions.cn: 为什么不送她一张电子贺卡?

questions.question: I promised him not ______ anyone.
questions.cn: 我答应他不告诉任何人。

questions.question: I ______ prefer a notebook computer.
questions.cn: 我还是更喜欢笔记型电脑。

questions.question: I prefer sitcom ______.
questions.cn: 我现在更喜欢情境喜剧。

questions.question: I know ______ to operate a computer.
It can last ______.
options: A. four and a half hours

questions.question: He ______ a box for firewood.
questions.cn: 他正在捣毁一只箱子当柴烧。

questions.question: It's certainly ______ yesterday.
questions.cn: 天气的确比昨天暖和多了。

questions.question: They spent too much time ______ clothes.
questions.cn: 他们买衣服花费了太多的时间。

questions.question: I ______ say your opinion is perfectly correct.
questions.cn: 我想说你的观点完全正确。

questions.question: Tom gave me permission ______ his bicycle.
questions.cn: 汤姆允许我使用他的脚踏车。

questions.question: We ______ call the police straight away!
He ______ by the police last week.
I am not ______ positive about it.
I'm sorry I ______ answer this question.
questions.cn: 很抱歉我无法回答这个问题。

questions.question: He is the right person ______ the position.
questions.cn: 他正是适合这项职位的人选。

questions.question: I think she is reading ______.
questions.cn: 我认为她现在正在看书。

questions.question: Thank you very much ______ saying that.
It's very nice ______ you to say so.
______ very kind of you to say so.
I ______ saw a prettier ring.
questions.cn: 我从来没看到过更美的戒指。

questions.question: I have ______ 5 black suitcases.
questions.cn: 我有一组五件套的黑色行李箱。

questions.question: The usher showed us ______ our seats.
questions.cn: 引座员引我们到座位上。

header: 英语语法初阶练习题（十六）

questions.question: Everyone wants ______.
questions.cn: 每个人都想有一个好身材。

questions.question: I'm sorry to say ______ the picture is very bad.
Literature is ______ my favorite.
questions.cn: 文学类一向是我的最爱。

questions.question: The special of the day is ______ crab.
I'll ______ my family.
questions.cn: 我要和我的家人待在一起。

questions.question: I am sure you'll be ______.
questions.cn: 我确信你一定会成功的。

questions.question: Can you tell me ______ WAP is?
Vitamin C is ______ to prevent a cold.
questions.cn: 维他命C被认为能预防感冒。

questions.question: You ______ have told him that.
questions.cn: 你本来用不着告诉他那个的。

questions.question: I don't know the time ______ he arrived.
questions.cn: 我不知道他什么时候到的。

questions.question: I can't understand ______ you mean.
questions.cn: 我不能理解你是什么意思。

questions.question: I like ______ you like.
questions.cn: 只要你喜欢的我就喜欢。

questions.question: Put this lotion on ______ a day.
Let me ______ the timetable for you.
questions.cn: 让我为您查看一下时间表。

questions.question: I think I can have it ______ tomorrow.
questions.cn: 我想明天即可将它修好。

questions.question: I'd like to go ______ I am free by then.
questions.cn: 如果到时有空,我愿意去。

questions.question: I am ______ a very huge file.
questions.cn: 我正在下载一个很大的文档。

questions.question: I'm ______ travel for a week in Europe.
questions.cn: 我打算去欧洲旅行一个星期。

questions.question: Here the ______ berth is for you.
There's a ______ at the Hilton Hotel.
I'm going ______ my blue jacket.
questions.cn: 我打算穿我那件蓝色的夹克。

questions.question: I know ______ he will say to me.
questions.cn: 我知道他要对我说什么。

questions.question: He has ______ as CEO.
questions.cn: 他已辞去了执行总裁的职位。

questions.question: He told me ______ he would go.

header: 英语语法初阶练习题（十七）

questions.question: I suggest you ______ have a try.
